dict.acceptation: 击败，战胜；挫败；[法]宣告无效，作废；

sent.orig: But victory was conceived in China's defeat, while defeat was conceived in Japan's victory.
sent.trans: 但是在中国的失败里面包含着胜利，在日本的胜利里面包含着失败。

sent.orig: Defeat after defeat filled us with despair.
sent.trans: 一次又一次的失败使我们完全绝望了。

sent.orig: A weak nation can defeat a strong a small nation can defeat a big.
sent.trans: 弱国能够打败强国，小国能够打败大国。

sent.orig: Never confuse a single defeat whit a final defeat.
sent.trans: 永远不要把一次失败和最终失败混为一谈。

sent.orig: It was the team's third successive defeat and their fourth defeat in five matches.
sent.trans: 这是该队连续第三次失败，也是五次比赛中的第四次失败。
